pages.text: $(li)Cocoa Beans can be planted in a Jungle Log to generate more Cocoa Beans.$(br)$(li)You can use Cocoa Beans to craft $(l)Chocolate Bars$(), $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/cocoa_bean_sack)Cocoa Beans Sacks$(/l), $(l)Brown Dye$(), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l), or $(l)Cookies$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)You can use this item as an ingredient to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/upgrade_aquatic/restfulness)Potion of Restfulness$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l) of the Overworld.
